title: RADAR-base protocol for the aRMT app questionnaire delivery
description: A protocol for the RADAR-base aRMT app describes what questionnaires should be proposed to participants at what time. It controls notification times, label text and the questionnaire sources. The reference questionnaire app is described on the wiki page https://radar-base.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/RAD/pages/463241217/Protocol+Schedule.

allOf.title: Protocol version
allOf.description: Update this version whenever the aRMT app should read any changes.

schemaVersion.title: Reference to this schema
schemaVersion.description: The version of this schema describing the protocol structure.

name.title: Protocol set name
name.description: The name of the set of protocols. It should match the study that the protocol is being used in.

healthIssues.title: Health issues
healthIssues.description: Study area of health issues that are covered by the questionnaire.

protocols.title: Questionnaire protocols
protocols.description: List of questionnaire protocols in the study protocol.

showIntroduction.title: Show an introduction
showIntroduction.description: True or 'once' if an introduction to the questionnaire should be shown once, false or 'never' otherwise. If the introduction should always be shown, value set should be 'always'. The contents of the introduction are defined by the 'startText' property.

showInCalendar.title: Whether the questionnaire should show up on the task calendar.
showInCalendar.description: True if the questionnaire should show up on the task calendar and show task information, or false, if it should be hidden (for example, for randomised questionnaires).

isDemo.title: Whether the questionnaire is only a demo
isDemo.description: True if the questionnaire is only a demo, so the data for the questionnaire should not be sent to the server.

order.title: Order for showing tasks in the home page
order.description: Order for choosing tasks to prioritize in the home page when multiple tasks are pending and order for showing clinical tasks, where 0 has the highest order/priority.

allOf.title: Start text
allOf.description: Text shown in the app before starting a questionnaire. Enable it with the 'showIntroduction' property.

allOf.title: End text
allOf.description: Text shown in the app after finishing a questionnaire.

allOf.title: Warning text
allOf.description: Warning shown when the questionnaire has not been filled.

schedule.title: Questionnaire protocol schedule
schedule.description: Protocol including schedule for the questionnaire.

allOf.title: Protocol repetition
allOf.description: How frequently the protocol should be repeated for each participant.

allOf.title: Questionnaire repetitions
allOf.description: What time of day questionnaires should be posed. The day that questionnaires are posed are specified with repeatProtocol, the local time is defined by this repeatQuestionnaire (units offset from repeat from midnight repeatProtocol day).

clinicalProtocol.title: Clinical protocol
clinicalProtocol.description: Defines repetitions of the protocol after a clinical visit.

requiresInClinicCompletion.title: Requires in-clinic completion.
requiresInClinicCompletion.description: Whether the test should be performed during a clinical visit.

allOf.title: Test repetitions
allOf.description: When to repeat the test after a clinic visit.

onDemandProtocol.title: Protocol can be run on demand
onDemandProtocol.description: Whether the questionnaire or task can be started by the participant on demand

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire to use
questionnaire.description: Reference to the questionnaire specification. This defines the questions, field type, branching logic etc.

name.title: Questionnaire name
name.description: Name should match file name under the URL provided in the repository property.

avsc.title: Schema
avsc.description: Avro Schema name as defined in RADAR-Schemas.

reminderSpecification.title: Reminder schedule
reminderSpecification.description: When and how often to remind participants that a questionnairie still has to be filled out.

reminderList.title: Reminder list
reminderList.description: When and how often to remind participants that a questionnairie still has to be filled out.

unitsFromZero.title: Times starting at midnight
unitsFromZero.description: Times, starting from midnight, that a protocol should be suggested.

unit.title: Amount unit
unit.description: Duration unit attached to the amount property.

version.title: Semantic version
version.description: Use semantic versioning for the version.

multiLanguageText.title: Multi-language text
multiLanguageText.description: Text in the language corresponding to property name. The property name should be a ISO 639-1 two letter language code or BCP-47 language tag.

vibrate.title: Vibration on notification
vibrate.description: Notification will be set to trigger vibrate on the phone

sound.title: Sound on notification
sound.description: Notification will be set to trigger sound on the phone
